University Health Services
›              HealthConnect
At this time, online scheduling is available only for select appointment types. All students may still access
HealthConnect
to request medication refills, medical records, complete forms, etc.
Incoming Students
If you are matriculating in August, you will not have access to Health Connect until the end of May.
HealthConnect
HealthConnect is University Health Services' secure online portal, where enrolled students can:
Select
Messages
to: request emergency contraception, prescription refills, and medical records; send messages to providers they've seen;
Select
Medical Clearances
to complete required immunization records and forms
Select
Insurance Card
to submit health insurance information and upload images of insurance cards
Select
Appointments
to schedule Telehealth, vaccine, blood work, and certain wellness exams
Select
Medical Clearances
to check your required registration tasks
status
Update Your Profile in HealthConnect
There are several reasons one may wish to update their
HealthConnect
profile, including the following:
enable text messaging, for important notifications and reminders
add a preferred name
update your pronouns
update your gender identity
confirm your local address
Review
step-by-step instructions (pdf)
on how to update your profile.
Log into HealthConnect
Need a UHS receipt?
Itemized receipts for all UHS visits can be found in HealthConnect, under Statements in the left menu.
Messages from HealthConnect
STUDENTS:
You will receive this message in your inbox from NOREPLY-UHS@CMU.EDU:
Subject: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM CARNEGIE MELLON UNIVERSITY HEALTH SERVICES
You have a new message from your provider at University Health Services. To access your message, log in to HealthConnect at
https://healthservices.andrew.cmu.edu
with your andrew username and password, and select Messages from the left menu.
The security of HealthConnect is monitored by Carnegie Mellon University's Security Office.
